page.title: 06AUTUMN TERM IN SEDGEFIELD
page.content: THE FIRST BIG EVENT IN OUR SCHOOL YEAR IS THE HARVEST FESTIVAL.AT HARVEST TIME WE COLLECT THINGS TO BRING TO SCHOOL LIKE FOOD AND FLOWERS. WE SET THEM ALL ON A TABLE.SOME OF THE FOOD GOES TO OLD PEOPLE AND SOME WE RAFFLE.THE TOP CLASS LEARN POEMS TO READ AND SONGS TO SING. AT THE END OF CHRISTMAS TERM THE TOP CLASS PERFORM A PLAY AND MAMS AND DADS COME TO WATCH YOU TAKE.THE TOP CLASSES CHRISTMAS PLAY FOR 1984 WAS CALLED "QUEEN BERYL AND THE ROMANS." WE HAVE CHRISTMAS PARTIES WHERE WE HAVE FOOD AND GAMES. THE TOP TWO CLASSES HAVE A DISCO FOR THEIR PARTY. FOR SCHOOL WORK WE HAVE MATHS, ENGLISH,HANDWRITING,P.E. ART,RADIO BROADCAST,READING.
